document.full_text: militants on the pakistan side of divided kashmir say they will give new talks with india a chance but they have little faith they will succeed and believe it is only a matter of time before they will have to fight again.
document.title: kashmiri militants watch talks but ready to fight
lines_and_colors: militants on the pakistan side of divided kashmir say they will give new talks with india a chance but they have little faith they will succeed and believe it is only a matter of time before they will have to fight again.
